# HMAddAccessoryRequest

**Class**

A request to add an accessory to a particular home.

## Declaration

```swift
class HMAddAccessoryRequest
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest] instance describes an accessory that your app should add to a home. HomeKit calls your home manager delegate’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHomeManagerDelegate/homeManager(_:didReceiveAddAccessoryRequest:)] method with a request.

Use the request’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest/accessoryName] and [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest/accessoryCategory] properties to obtain a token by negotiating with the accessory outside of HomeKit. If the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest/requiresSetupPayloadURL] property is `true`, also prepare a setup payload URL. Then create a setup payload with either the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest/makePayload(url:ownershipToken:)] or [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest/makePayload(ownershipToken:)] method. Complete the request by calling the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMHome/addAndSetupAccessories(with:completionHandler:)] method on the request’s [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAddAccessoryRequest/home] property.

## Characterizing the Request

- **home**: The home to which to add the accessory.
- **accessoryCategory**: The category of the accessory to add.
- **accessoryName**: The name of the accessory to add.
- **requiresOwnershipToken**: An indication of whether the add operation requires an ownership token.
- **requiresSetupPayloadURL**: An indication of whether the add operation requires a setup payload URL.

## Creating a Payload

- **makePayload(ownershipToken:)**: Builds an accessory setup payload with the given ownership token.
- **makePayload(url:ownershipToken:)**: Builds an accessory setup payload with the given setup payload URL and ownership token.

## Initializers

- **init()**

## Adding accessories

- **homeManager(_:didReceiveAddAccessoryRequest:)**: Tells the delegate to add an accessory to a home by using a setup payload.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
